forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 71 overnight. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. North northeast wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
